title: Normalized Gradients for All. (arXiv:2308.05621v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: In this short note, I show how to adapt to H\"{o}lder smoothness using normalized gradients in a black-box way. Moreover, the bound will depend on a novel notion of local H\"{o}lder smoothness. The main idea directly comes from Levy [2017].

Title: Normalized Gradients for All. (arXiv:2308.05621v1 [cs.LG])
Abstract: In this short note, I show how to adapt to H\"{o}lder smoothness using normalized gradients in a black-box way. Moreover, the bound will depend on a novel notion of local H\"{o}lder smoothness. The main idea directly comes from Levy [2017].
translated_title: 所有情况下的标准化梯度
translated_abstract: 在这篇简短的论文中，我展示了如何以黑盒的方式利用标准化梯度来适应 H\"{o}lder 光滑性。此外，这个界限将依赖于局部 H\"{o}lder 光滑性的一种新概念。主要思想直接来自于 Levy [2017]。
tldr: 这篇论文提出了一种利用标准化梯度适应 H\"{o}lder 光滑性的方法，并引入了局部 H\"{o}lder 光滑性的新概念。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a method for adapting to H\"{o}lder smoothness using normalized gradients, and introduces a novel notion of local H\"{o}lder smoothness.
